items.content_html: The JS Buy SDK is a lightweight library that allows you to build ecommerce into any website. It is based on Shopify's API and provides the ability to retrieve products and collections from your shop, add products to a cart, and checkout.
items.title: Shopify/js-buy-sdk: The JS Buy SDK is a lightweight library that allows you to build ecommerce into any website. It is based on Shopify's API and provides the ability to retrieve products and collections from your shop, add products to a cart, and checkout.

items.content_html: Pigeon-MQTT-Nest is a lightweight and easy-to-use library that provides a simple MQTT broker for your NestJS applications. With this library, you can easily integrate MQTT messaging into your NestJS application and communicate with MQTT clients using topics and messages.
items.title: behnamnasehi/pigeon-mqtt-nest: Pigeon-MQTT-Nest is a lightweight and easy-to-use library that provides a simple MQTT broker for your NestJS applications. With this library, you can easily integrate MQTT messaging into your NestJS application and communicate with MQTT clients using topics and messages.

items.title: chrisguttandin/dynamo-db-provisioner: A lightweight and promise-based wrapper of the AWS SDK to create and delete tables.

items.content_html: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.
items.title: testcontainers/testcontainers-node: Testcontainers is a NodeJS library that supports tests, providing lightweight, throwaway instances of common databases, Selenium web browsers, or anything else that can run in a Docker container.

items.content_html: 🏠 A lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CCU3, ELV-Charly or for running your "HomeMatic CCU" IoT central as a pure virtual appliance (using Proxmox VE, VirtualBox, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, Home Assistant, vmWare ESXi, etc.) or on your own RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, ODROID, etc. SBC device...
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CCU3, ELV-Charly or for running your "HomeMatic CCU" IoT central as a pure virtual appliance (using Proxmox VE, VirtualBox, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, Home Assistant, vmWare ESXi, etc.) or on your own RaspberryPi, Tinkerboard, ODROID, etc. SBC device...
